# This test will test every command on the opsheet

ADD R1 R2 R3
# 0000 0001 0010 0011 / 0123
SUB R1 R2 R3
# 0001 0001 0010 0011 / 1123
AND R1 R2 R3
# 0010 0001 0010 0011 / 2123
ORR R1 R2 R3
# 0011 0001 0010 0011 / 3123
EOR R1 R2 R3
# 0100 0001 0010 0011 / 4123
LSL R1 R2 R3
# 0101 0001 0010 0011 / 5123
LSR R1 R2 R3
# 0110 0001 0010 0011 / 6123
ASR R1 R2 R3
# 0111 0001 0010 0011 / 7123
LDR R1 [R2]
# 1000 0001 0010 0000 / 8120
STR R1 [R2]
# 1001 0001 0010 0000 / 9120
CMP R1 R2
# 1010 0001 0010 0000 / A120
MOV R1 R2
# 1011 0001 0010 0000 / B120
B 0x10
# 1100 0000 0001 0000 / C010
BEQ 0x1A
# 1101 0000 0001 1010 / D01A
END
# 1110 0000 0000 0000 / E000
NOP
# 1111 0000 0000 0000 / F000

# Congratulations if you passed this test
# Correct output: 0123112321233123412351236123712381209120A120B120C010D01AE000F000
